title: Windows Copilot autostart tests limited to 27" displays or larger
description: Microsoft says that tests of a controversial new Windows 11 feature that automatically opens the AI-powered Copilot assistant after Windows starts are limited to systems with 27-inch displays. [...]

title: US court docs expose fake antivirus renewal phishing tactics
description: In a seizure warrant application, the U.S. Secret Service sheds light on how threat actors stole $34,000 using fake antivirus renewal subscription emails. [...]

title: Microsoft working on a fix for Windows 10 0x80070643 errors
description: Microsoft is working to fix a known issue causing 0x80070643 errors when installing the KB5034441 security update that patches the CVE-2024-20666 BitLocker vulnerability. [...]

title: Windows SmartScreen flaw exploited to drop Phemedrone malware
description: A Phemedrone information-stealing malware campaign exploits a Microsoft Defender SmartScreen vulnerability (CVE-2023-36025) to bypass Windows security prompts when opening URL files. [...]

title: Over 178K SonicWall firewalls vulnerable to DoS, potential RCE attacks
description: Security researchers have found over 178,000 SonicWall next-generation firewalls (NGFW) with the management interface exposed online are vulnerable to denial-of-service (DoS) and potential remote code execution (RCE) attacks. [...]

title: Latest Adblock update causes massive YouTube performance hit
description: Adblock and Adblock Plus users report performance issues on YouTube, initially blamed on Google but later determined to be an issue in the popular ad-blocking extension. [...]
